oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (KVOO) - 1948-03-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK radio program of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band. Originally broadcast 1948-03-29 at 12:15 pm (CST). Sponsored by Nutrena, with announcer Johnny Ryan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Leon McAuliffe; Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Station announcement -- Opening statement (Johnny Ryan) -- Opening theme (Steel Guitar Rag) -- Nutrena jingle -- Johnny Ryan introduces Leon McAuliffe -- Painted Rhythm (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Nutrena commercial (Johnny Ryan) -- Miss Molly (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan announces the band's appearance schedule -- It Takes A Long Long Train With A Red Caboose (To Carry My Blues Away) (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Johnny Ryan and Leon McAuliffe talk -- Nutrena commercial (Johnny Ryan) -- Wagoner (Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Johnny Ryan) -- Nutrena jingle -- Station announcement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); McAuliffe, Leon, 1917-1988; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Ryan, Johnny (Announcer); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-
